requested: app that takes a csv and returns a guess of what the csv is about with not set input format
implemented: takes a CSV file and returns a one-sentence guess of the dataset's topic

issues.message: Input file format is specified as CSV, but there's no input format validation or flexibility.
Minor UI improvements (e.g., add loading indicator when switching files).

fixInstructions: Implement input format validation and flexibility. Also, add a loading indicator when switching files.
